description: This source file implements platform-dependent and general utility functions for the Slap Access Manager object within the Service Logic Aggregation Plane (SLAP). It primarily contains the function to create a new Slap Access Manager object.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE SlapCreateAccessManager(ANSC_HANDLE hContainerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hOwnerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hAnscReserved)
methods.description: Creates and returns a new Slap Access Manager object handle, encapsulating the creation logic via the SlapAmoCreate function.
